title: Baying For Blood
description: That’s when the tears came. Hot angry tears that didn’t understand what the hell was happening to my body, what the hell was happening to me.I just wanted Violet to put her arms around me & tell me it was all going to be alright like she always did. But I got the distinct impression she couldn’t or wouldn’t do that any more. Because nothing was ever going to be alright again. When it becomes a choice between fight or flight, which will this new werewolf choose?Logan wakes naked & covered in blood. Unable to remember anything, he hopes he’s just been at the neighbour’s chickens again, but a werewolf serial killer has claimed another victim & Logan’s clothes & phone have been found at the scene.Despite the evidence, PI Violet Eonsen doesn’t believe her brother has killed anyone. She just needs to prove it. After the events of Preying On Time, she can’t let him down. Besides, who better to lure out the true killer of all those necromancers than a necromancer herself?With friend Simon in tow, Violet goes undercover to discover the killer stalking the keepers of the dead, but when her life ends up in danger is she the one that’s bitten off more than she can chew? Will Logan be proved innocent? & can the real murderer be brought to justice?
author: Rebecca Clare Smith
